titles.title: A resolution acknowledging the lifelong service of Griffin Boyette Bell, a legal icon, to the State of Georgia and to the United States.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary:
1/16/2009--Introduced. Acknowledges the lifelong services of Griffin Boyette Bell to the state of Georgia and the United States as a legal icon.
Commends him for his tenure as Attorney General of the United States and his commitment to the American Civil Rights Movement.
